rows.label: qev013101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ho there, friend! Would you lend an ear to some
of my poetry? The words are free if you wish it,
though tips are always welcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_JNK0010
rows.name: Tip

rows.label: qev013101_SEL0011
rows.name: Listen and give some money.

rows.label: qev013101_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev013101_SEL0021
rows.name: Refuse to contribute or listen.

rows.label: qev013101_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev013101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask if he is one of the Celeste Three.

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm not some low-rent hustler, if that's what
you're thinking. I merely wanted to offer your
day a poetical parenthetical.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Though most claim my works are...disturbing.
One reviewer even called them "incantations
more befitting the wailing of the damned."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0004
rows.name:
This world is as black and cold as your heart!
...Ah, but I understand. People must save their
precious coins for their own pocket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0005
rows.name:
Egads! How is it you know of the tragedies
of my past?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0012
rows.name:
The mass disappearance just after our arrival
here on Mira...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0013
rows.name:
The three of us were left behind as everyone
else involved simply...vanished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0043
rows.name:
I'd assumed the truth of that incident would
remain forever obscured, and yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0006
rows.name:
No. This is fate. The will of the heavens!
A chance of which I never dared dream!
O muse, thou art a beast of fire![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0007
rows.name:
If you would hear more of the Celeste Three,
then I must ask something of you.
...But not here. Too many ears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0008
rows.name:
If these scrabbling wretches knew that we carried a
load of white gold, the streets would burn with the
chaos of avarice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0009
rows.name:
Let us speak in the diner at night, when the
secrets of men might better slink soft around
every fog-beshrouded corner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Midnight it is, then. I shall await you at the
Repenta diner in the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's no trouble if you're a bit late.
I shall abide there until the first pale rays
of dawn alight on my pancake stack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Thank you for coming. I suppose I should
begin with an explanation of the incident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Anyway, yes. It was a short while after we crashed
here on Mira—just over a month ago now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0016
rows.name:
A large convoy of BLADEs were transporting
a sizable shipment of rare white gold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0017
rows.name:
But they suddenly disappeared...and their cargo
along with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0018
rows.name:
They called the few of us who remained the
Celeste Three.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0042
rows.name:
But this was no paranormal phenomenon
such as the urban legends claim![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_JNK0040
rows.name: Show Interest

rows.label: qev013101_SEL0041
rows.name: Keep listening.

rows.label: qev013101_JNK0050
rows.name: Express Doubt

rows.label: qev013101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask where the other survivors are.

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0019
rows.name:
I've heard talk it was the work of a supernatural
force or an alien abduction. Some even claim
the spectral hands of ghosts were involved![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Ah, an excellent question, my friend,
for that is at the very heart of the incident.
Was it aliens? Ghosts? Something else?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0021
rows.name: Alas, no. It was simply...a slaughter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Briggs, the team leader, wanted the white gold
for himself, and—maddened by the sickness of
greed—began killing the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0023
rows.name:
...And I helped him. God save me, but I did.
In fear for our own lives, myself and a man
named Moorehouse helped murder our own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Briggs had us move the white gold to a
hiding place, then sent out an SOS and
waited for help to arrive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0025
rows.name:
We swore to tell no one of our dark deeds,
and to a man bespoke an oath of silence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Then we returned to the city and assumed the
role of victims. Just three men caught up in
an inexplicable incident...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_JNK0060
rows.name: Assert

rows.label: qev013101_SEL0061
rows.name: Propose that Briggs should be brought to justice.

rows.label: qev013101_JNK0070
rows.name: Blame

rows.label: qev013101_SEL0071
rows.name: Censure Fosdyke for his role in the crime.

rows.label: qev013101_JNK0080
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev013101_SEL0081
rows.name: Demand the white gold for yourself.

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Ah, a crusader for right! I saw it in your eyes the
moment we met, which is why I brought you here to
beg this boon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0028
rows.name:
I don't deny my part in this. But what justice can be
served while the man behind the slaughter goes free?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0029
rows.name:
If his atrocities can be brought to light,
I'll happily accept whatever punishment awaits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Your directness is...surprising. But if that is
your aim, you'll need to track down Briggs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Unfortunately, Briggs was a step ahead of us
the whole time. He vanished soon after we
returned to NLA, along with the white gold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0032
rows.name:
After this whole chain of events, all I was left with
was a marble-sized chunk of white-gold ore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0033
rows.name: You must take it and meet with Moorehouse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0034
rows.name:
He was closer to Briggs than I was and may know
something of his current whereabouts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0035
rows.name:
Moorehouse is a suspicious man, but this
bauble should convince him, for he and I
hold the only two in existence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0036
rows.name:
I leave this in your hands, then. Just remember that he
is in the same circumstances as I—once he realizes
what's happening, I'm certain he'll cooperate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0037
rows.name:
Moorehouse quit the BLADEs just after me.
I wager he's living a quiet life somewhere
in the shadows of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0038
rows.name:
Look for him in places like the commercial district's
storage areas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0039
rows.name: Spoke with Moorehouse, have you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0040
rows.name:
Good. Next comes a reunion with Briggs
and the lost white gold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013101_MSG0041
rows.name:
It's time to drag all the skeletons out of the
closet and into the light, where we may
finally set them to dance![ST:wait ]
